1.name: Easy Rider
1.description: Through the open country and desert lands, two bikers head from L.A to New Orleans, and along the way, meet a man who bridges a counter-culture gap they are unaware of.

2.name: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
2.description: James Bond woos a mob boss' daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps that involves beautiful women from around the world.

3.name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
3.description: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

4.name: Midnight Cowboy
4.description: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

5.name: The Wild Bunch
5.description: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

6.name: The Learning Tree
6.description: The story, set in Kansas during the 1920s, covers less than a year in the life of a black teenager, and documents the veritable deluge of events which force him into sudden manhood. The ...                See full summary »

7.name: True Grit
7.description: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian territory.

8.name: Battle of Britain
8.description: In 1940, the British Royal Air Force fights a desperate battle to prevent the Luftwaffe from gaining air superiority over the English Channel as a prelude to a possible Axis invasion of the U.K.

9.name: The Italian Job
9.description: Comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

10.name: La piscine
10.description: Lovers Marianne and Jean-Paul spend their vacation in a villa on the French Riviera near St-Tropez. Marianne invites her former lover, Harry, and his teenage daughter to stay. Tension rises between them, especially when Jean-Paul seduces Penelope.

11.name: Cactus Flower
11.description: A dentist pretends to be married to avoid commitment, but when he falls for his girlfriend and proposes, he must recruit his lovelorn nurse to pose as his wife.

12.name: Bara no sôretsu
12.description: The trials and tribulations of Eddie and other transvestites in Japan.

13.name: Bob & Carol & Ted & Alice
13.description: A light-hearted picture of middle-aged love and friendship.

14.name: Model Shop
14.description: George Matthews is a young man who is having a bittersweet affair with a French divorcée in Los Angeles. Waiting to be drafted, he is unable to commit himself to anything or anybody, ...                See full summary »

15.name: 100 Rifles
15.description: In 1912 Sonora, Mexico, native revolutionary Yaqui Joe robs a bank to buy arms for his oppressed people, but finds himself sought by an American lawman and the Mexican Army.

16.name: Hello, Dolly!
16.description: Matchmaker Dolly Levi travels to Yonkers to find a partner for "half-a-millionaire" Horace Vandergelder, convincing his niece, his niece's intended, and his two clerks to travel to New York City along the way.

17.name: Support Your Local Sheriff!
17.description: In the old west, a man becomes a Sheriff just for the pay, figuring he can decamp if things get tough. In the end, he uses ingenuity instead.

18.name: The Bridge at Remagen
18.description: As the Allied armies close in, the Germans decide to blow up the last Rhine bridge, trapping their own men on the wrong side. But will it happen?

19.name: Fellini - Satyricon
19.description: A series of disjointed mythical tales set in first century Rome.

20.name: Kes
20.description: A young, English working-class boy spends his free time caring for and training his pet falcon.

21.name: Putney Swope
21.description: Dark satire in which the token black man on the executive board of an advertising firm is accidentally put in charge. Renaming the business "Truth and Soul, Inc.", he replaces the tight ...                See full summary »

22.name: Paint Your Wagon
22.description: Two unlikely prospector partners share the same wife in a California gold rush mining town.

23.name: They Shoot Horses, Don't They?
23.description: The lives of a disparate group of contestants intertwine in an inhumanely grueling dance marathon.

24.name: Z
24.description: Following the murder of a prominent leftist, an investigator tries to uncover the truth while government officials attempt to cover up their roles.

25.name: Women in Love
25.description: Two best friends fall in love with a pair of women, but the relationships soon go in very different directions.

26.name: The Army of Shadows
26.description: An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

27.name: Mackenna's Gold
27.description: A bandit kidnaps a Marshal who has seen a map showing a gold vein on Indian lands, but other groups are looking for it too, while the Apache try to keep the secret location undisturbed.

28.name: Age of Consent
28.description: A grizzled Australian painter decides to jolt his stale creativity in a remote island on the Great Barrier Reef, where he meets an alluring young islander who becomes his enchanting model. Could the untamed girl be his long-awaited muse?

29.name: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
29.description: A headstrong young teacher in a private school in 1930s Edinburgh ignores the curriculum and influences her impressionable 12 year old charges with her over-romanticized world view.

30.name: The Undefeated
30.description: After the Civil War, ex-Confederate soldiers heading for a new life in Mexico run into ex-Union cavalrymen selling horses to the Mexican government but they must join forces to fight off Mexican bandits and revolutionaries.

31.name: The Gay Deceivers
31.description: Danny and Elliot avoid military service by pretending to be gay, but they have to act the part when the recruiting officer doesn't buy it.

32.name: The Secret of Santa Vittoria
32.description: During WWII in Italy, a wine producing village hide a million bottles from the Germans

33.name: Sweet Charity
33.description: Taxi dancer Charity continues to have Faith in the human race despite apparently endless disappointments at its hands, and Hope that she will finally meet the nice young man to romance her ...                See full summary »

34.name: La caduta degli dei (Götterdämmerung)
34.description: The dramatic collapse of a wealthy, industrialist/Junker family during the reign of the Third Reich.

35.name: Topaz
35.description: A French Intelligence Agent becomes embroiled in the Cold War politics first with uncovering the events leading up to the 1962 Cuban Missile Crisis, and then back to France to break up an international Russian spy ring.

36.name: Anne of the Thousand Days
36.description: Henry VIII of England discards one wife, Catharine of Aragon, who has failed to produce a male heir, in favor of the young and beautiful Anne Boleyn.

37.name: Sayat Nova
37.description: A super-stylized, surreal biography of Armenian troubadour Sayat Nova, whose life is depicted through non-narrative amalgamations of poetic images.

38.name: Pippi Långstrump
38.description: Pippi Longstocking, a super-strong redheaded little girl, moves into her father's cottage Villa Villekulla, and has adventures with her next-door neighbors Tommy and Annika in this compilation film of the classic Swedish TV series.

39.name: The Magic Christian
39.description: Sir Guy Grand, the richest man in the world, adopts a homeless boy, Youngman. Together, they set out to prove that anyone, and anything, can be bought with money.

40.name: Carry On Camping
40.description: Sid and Bernie keep having their amorous intentions snubbed by their girlfriends Joan and Anthea. The boys suggest a camping holiday, secretly intending to take them to a nudist camp. Of ...                See full summary »

41.name: Zeta One
41.description: A race of topless, large-breasted women from the planet Angvia, in another dimension, come to earth to kidnap women to repopulate their planet.

42.name: The Haunted House of Horror
42.description: Teenagers gathered in an old mansion are being murdered one by one. The survivors must discover who among them is the killer before he finishes off everybody.

43.name: The Sterile Cuckoo
43.description: Two students from neighboring colleges in upstate New York are swept up in a tragic romantic interlude calling for a maturity of vision beyond their experience of capabilities. Pookie Adams...                See full summary »

44.name: Medium Cool
44.description: A TV news reporter finds himself becoming personally involved in the violence that erupts around the 1968 Democratic National Convention.

45.name: Medea
45.description: After his quest to retrieve the fabled Golden Fleece, Jason returns to Greece with the powerful sorceress, Medea. However, when the king banishes her, it's only human that Medea plots her furious revenge. Can they escape her wrath?

46.name: Alice's Restaurant
46.description: A cinematic adaption of Arlo Guthrie's classic song story.

47.name: The Computer Wore Tennis Shoes
47.description: At Medfield College, an accident with a donated computer gives Dexter Riley the ability to remember any knowledge learned instantly and perfectly.

48.name: Spalovac mrtvol
48.description: Set in World War II, a demented cremator believes cremation relieves earthly suffering and sets out to save the world.

49.name: Ma nuit chez Maud
49.description: The rigid principles of a devout Catholic man are challenged during a one-night stay with Maud, a divorced woman with an outsize personality.

50.name: Marlowe
50.description: A young woman from Kansas hires LA private detective Philip Marlowe to find her missing brother.
